means: 瓣鳃类（如蚌，牡蛎，干贝等）

PerfectNetExp.abs: lamelli- 表示“薄片lamellibranch 瓣鳃类lamellibranchiate 瓣鳃类的
lamella (1)片；层；板，(2)瓣；鳃瓣lamellibranch 瓣鳃动物Lamellibranchia 瓣鳃纲
...有的种类仅鳃轴一侧生有鳃丝,呈梳状,称栉鳃,ctenidium,有的鳃成瓣状,称瓣鳃,lamellibranch,有些种类的鳃延长成丝状,称丝鳃,filibranch,有的本鳃消失,又在背侧皮肤表面生出次生.
lamellibranch 双壳贝, lamellibranch 瓣鳃纲软体动物, lamellibranch 瓣鳃纲

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from modern Latin Lamellibranchia (former class name), from Latin lamella (diminutive of lamina 'thin plate') + Greek brankhia 'gills'

means.word_mean: 1. marine or freshwater mollusks having a soft body with platelike gills enclosed within two shells hinged together
